data.title: Brooks Elementary Before & After School
data.text:
After School

YMCA After School programs prepare children to be problem solvers by providing them with the skills needed to manage their emotions and show empathy toward others. Each day, we offer a variety of activities that allow your children to build new skills and healthy habits. Our curriculum supports learning through active play and a focus on character development.

We offer quiet spaces and support for students to work on their homework Monday through Thursday afternoons.

During the week, students will participate in a variety of enrichment activities with opportunities for skill development, physical activity and fun.

YMCA After School is held from school dismissal until 6 p.m.

Before School

The YMCA Before School program is also held at this school. This program starts at 7 a.m. and dismisses at the first bell. Kids can eat breakfast from the school cafeteria, work on homework or simply relax and enjoy quiet time with their friends.

Buy Early & Save

Register for five-day, yearly After School for the entire 2024 - 25 school year by Sept. 7, and receive 50% off Holiday Care at the Y. Plus you'll receive our best price for After School!

2024 - 2025 Prices

After School per Year Cost

$2,373 (Member, 5-day)

$2,968 (Participant, 5-day)

After School per Week Cost

$73.80 (Member, 5-day)

$92.25 (Participant, 5-day)

Before School per Year Cost

$1,672 (Member, 5-day)

$2,092 (Participant, 5-day)

Before School per Week Cost

$52 (Member, 5-day)

$65 (Participant, 5-day)

Register

Our Staff

YMCA counselors are energetic and enjoy working with children. We train our counselors to be leaders and positive role models. Most are high school and college-aged students.

Parent Information
